title: Ride-through
description: Ability to withstand voltage or frequency disturbances and continue operating.

sections.title: Definition in an IEEE Standard
sections.body_md: > Ability to withstand voltage or frequency disturbances inside defined limits and to continue operating as specified.

sections.title: Definition in Another IEEE Standard
sections.body_md: > Fault ride-through is the capability of staying connected during the occurrence of a fault beyond the equipment output terminals.
